attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many people who only marry for stealing money, this is called fraud, they do not intend to stay with the person they married, it is not death do us part, but con do us part. Joint accounts are being used to con the victims out of money, the law says that husbands & wives cannot be done for duress & undue influence, but that is what these people do, this law has to change regarding this, this should not be a civil matter, but a criminal one. The marriage is a con, therefore the con artist is using the marriage to get away with this type of crime.
